Hi Rich;

Very interesting tsuba.  I do not think I have ever seen one like=
 it.  Not the design or the unusually shaped large kozuka hitsu.  Sort of l=
ike some of the early Jingo but different.

The shape of the nakago ana is =
also unusual in that it does not have the shape you would expect to see tha=
t would tightly fit a nakago, and I think it would be difficult to fit a se=
ppa without covering the sukashi design.

The look of the iron on the plate=
 seems a little coarser and I do not see any of the large bones in the surf=
ace of the plate.  Its hard to tell from pictures though.  The hoan tsuba I=
 have handled have been abut 1.2 to 1.3mm thick.

Very interesting unusual =
tsuba.

John
